name: Vuforia
summary: An Obj-C wrapper for the VuforiaSDK
description: A simple Obj-C wrapper for the VuforiaSDK

xcconfig.OTHER_LDFLAGS[sdk=iphoneos*]: $(inherited) -framework AVFoundation -framework CoreMotion -framework CoreMedia -framework CoreVideo -framework SystemConfiguration -framework Security -framework QuartzCore -framework OpenGLES
